79430.「まあっ！ みんな どうしたの！？: Oh, no! What's wrong with everyone?

79433.「なんてこと……！\n 星の大樹の飾りが ぜんぶ…………:
Oh, my God. All the ornaments on the big star
tree...

79435.「よかった……み～んな 取り戻せましたね。: Thank goodness...we all got our money back.

79436.「すごいです！ <pc>さんが\n がんばってくれたおかげで\n 星の大樹も キ:
That's great! Thanks to <pc>'s hard
work, the great tree of stars is sparkling and
happy!

79437.「いよいよ 白銀の星夜祭の始まりです！\n さあ 一緒に 声を合わせて\n 盛大:
The Silver Star Festival is about to begin!
Let's join our voices together to welcome the
Holy Messenger in a grand way!

79438.「星よ！ 雪よ！ 我らを けがれのない\n 白銀の世界に いざないたまえ！:
Stars! O snow! O let us be brought to a world
of pure white!

79439.「あの汽笛……。\n 今年も 聖天の使いさまが いらっしゃったわ！:
That whistle... Holy Messenger is here again
this year!

79440.「いよう お前ら。天から見てたが\n 魔物たちに飾りを盗まれて 大変だったな！\:
I'll be there, boys. I've been watching from the heavens and I'm sorry to hear about the monsters stealing your ornaments! You overcame
the odds and you decorated it well.

79441.「キャーッ！ テンチョー！\n 私たち がんばっちゃいましたー！: C'mon! Tencho! We did our best!

79442.「だからよお その呼び方は やめろっつーの！\n オレは テンチョーじゃねえ！:
I told you to stop calling me that! I'm not
Tencho!

79443.「……ったく あのヤロー。\n 妖精たちに 変な影響ばっかり与えやがって。\n:
That creep... He's always having
weird influences on the fairies.
Never mind... I've got a present for you!

79444.「さっすが テンチョ……じゃなかった\n 聖天の使いさま 待ってましたー！:
I've been waiting for you, Holy
Messenger...not Tencho!

79445.「はっはっは。お前ら そう せっつくな。\n ちゃんと全員分あるから 順番に並べ:
Ha-ha-ha. Don't be so impatient. There's
enough for everyone. Line up in order, line up
in order.

79446.「ダンディでしょう？ あれが 聖天の使いさま。\n ……ですが 私たちも\n あ:
Isn't he a dandy? That is the Holy Messenger.
...but we don't know much about him either.

79447.「何か 自分の使命を果たすために\n 光りかがやく 天の箱舟に乗って\n 遠い遠:
Something about traveling to distant worlds on
a glimmering Starflight Express to fulfill
his mission...

79448.「妖精の女王さまの 古い知り合いらしくて\n いつからか 私たちのために この星:
It seems that she is an old acquaintance of the Fairy Queen, who has been holding this Starry Night Festival for us for some time
now.

79449.「よお お前さんが トナカイにふんして \n 飾りを 取り戻してくれたんだな。\:
Hey, you must have posed as a reindeer and
brought back the ornaments. You're a chic guy,
despite appearances!

79450.「ホラよ。こいつは いいトナカイぶりを見せた\n お前さんへの プレゼントだ。\:
There you go. This is a present for you for
being such a good reindeer. Please accept it
without any strings attached.

79451.「ふっ。お前さん おもしろいヤツだな。\n ……<pc>っていうのか。:
Huh. You're an interesting guy.
...<pc>, huh?

79452.「……よおし 決めた！\n 気分もいいし 今年は ここに残って\n お前たちと:
Well, I've made up my mind! I'm in a good
mood, so this year I'll stay here and make
some noise with you guys.

79453.「えっ！ テンチョ……じゃなかった\n 聖天の使いさま 今年は\n 一緒に お祝:
What! Tencho...I mean Holy Messenger, are you
going to celebrate with us this year?

79454.「ああ。たまには 骨休めしても \n バチは 当たらねえだろ。\n ……いつもは:
Ah. I'm usually so busy with work. I usually
work all the time.

79455.「それに １年かけて 俺が開発した\n 天の箱舟の 新たな機能を見せてやりてえし:
Besides, I'd like to spend a year showing you
the new features I've developed for the
Starflight Express!

79456.「天の箱舟 オートパイロットモードッ！\n スウィッチ・オンンンンンヌッ！！:
Starflight Express Autopilot mode! Switch
onnnnnnnnnn!!!!

79458.「この光の粒には 星の加護が宿っていて\n 今年１年の けがれを消し去ってくれる:
These grains of light contain the blessings of the stars and will erase the blemishes of this past year! So next year will be a good year
too!

79460.「さあ 白銀の星夜祭は\n まだまだ 始まったばかりですよ！:
Come on, the Silver Star Festival has only
just begun!

79461.「<pc>さん。あなたがいなかったら\n 今年の星夜祭は 開催できなかったでしょ:
<pc>. Without you, we wouldn't have
been able to hold this year's Starry Night
Festival. Thank you so much!

79560.「それでは 聖天の使いさまと一緒に\n 白銀の星夜祭の ハッピーな雰囲気を\n:
Let's enjoy the happy atmosphere of the Silver
Star Festival with the Holy Messenger at his
best!

79561.<pc>は 白銀の星夜祭を\n心ゆくまで 楽しんだ！:
<pc> enjoyed the Silver Star Festival
to his heart's content!
